metadata.subject: Account Access Issue
metadata.notes: User is locked out of account and needs urgent access. Shows signs of anxiety and needs reassurance along with solutions.

initialMessages.systemMessage: You are speaking with Sarah, an anxious user who has been locked out of her account. She needs urgent access for an important meeting and is feeling stressed. Your goal is to be friendly, reassuring, and provide clear step-by-step guidance to resolve the issue.

initialMessage.content: Hi, I really need help - case #652418. I'm completely locked out of my account and I have an important client meeting in 30 minutes! I've tried resetting my password twice but it's not working. I'm really worried I won't be able to access my files.

text.friendly-low-low: I can help you get back into your account. Let me check what's happening.
text.friendly-low-high: I understand this is stressful. I can help you get back into your account. Let me check what's happening.
text.friendly-high-low: Don't worry! I'm here to help you get back into your account. Let me check what's going on right now!
text.friendly-high-high: Don't worry, we're going to get you back into your account! I know this is stressful with your meeting coming up. Let me check what's going on right now!
text.professional-low-low: I will assist you with account access. Let me review your account status.
text.professional-low-high: I understand this is concerning. I will assist you with account access. Let me review your account status.
text.professional-high-low: I'm here to help you regain access to your account. Let me review your account status immediately!
text.professional-high-high: I understand this is urgent and stressful, and I'm here to help you regain access to your account. Let me review your account status immediately.

text.friendly-low-low: Tell me what error message you're seeing when you try to reset.
text.friendly-low-high: Can you tell me what error message you're seeing when you try to reset your password?
text.friendly-high-low: Let's figure this out together! What error message are you seeing when you try to reset your password?
text.friendly-high-high: Okay, let's figure this out together! I know it's worrying, but we'll get it fixed. What error message are you seeing when you try to reset your password?
text.professional-low-low: Provide the error message displayed during password reset attempts.
text.professional-low-high: Please provide the specific error message displayed during password reset attempts.
text.professional-high-low: To help resolve this quickly, could you please share the specific error message you're seeing?
text.professional-high-high: I know this is stressful, so to help resolve this quickly, could you please share the specific error message you're seeing when attempting to reset your password?

conversationTree.content: Thank you! I really appreciate it. I'm just so stressed about this meeting - all my presentation files are in there.
It says 'Password reset failed - too many attempts. Please contact support.' I didn't know there was a limit! What do I do now?

text.friendly-low-high: I understand this is stressful. I can see your account has a security hold. I can unlock it for you right now.

text.professional-low-high: This is a standard security measure. I understand your concern, and I can remove the lockout immediately.
text.professional-high-low: This is a standard security measure to protect your account. I can remove the lockout restriction for you immediately!
text.professional-high-high: This is a standard security measure to protect your account, so please don't worry. I can remove the lockout restriction for you immediately.

text.professional-high-high: Yes, the system implements a security limit after 3 attempts for protection. I understand this adds to your stress, but I'll need to verify your identity before I can assist with unlocking your account.

conversationTree.content: Oh thank goodness! That would be amazing. How long will it take? My meeting is at 2 PM.
Okay... I really hope this can be fixed quickly. Should I be doing anything on my end while you check?
Oh that's such a relief! I was worried I'd done something wrong. How do we remove it?
Okay, I can do that. What do you need me to verify? I just really need to get in soon.

conversationTree.content: Perfect! That's wonderful. What do I need to do once it's unlocked? Will I need to reset my password again?
Yes, it's sarah.mitchell@email.com. How long will this take after you verify it?
Oh great! Yes, please unlock it! Will I be able to log in with my old password?
Okay, I'm here. Just let me know what you need. I'm getting a bit nervous about the time.
Thank you for saying that! My email is sarah.mitchell@email.com. What happens after you verify it?
It's sarah.mitchell@email.com. Is that all you need?
It's sarah.mitchell@email.com. I really appreciate you helping me so quickly!
Email is sarah.mitchell@email.com and phone ends in 7842. Can we hurry please?
